abstract: American Navy ships intecept and seize arms shipment from Iran in Arabian sea that was likely bound for Houthi rebels in Yemen; crew and ship were released once weapons were confiscated.
lead_paragraph: American Navy ships in the Arabian Sea intercepted and seized an arms shipment from Iran likely bound for Houthi rebels in Yemen, the military said.

headline.main: Yemen: U.S. Seizes Weapons at Sea
headline.print_headline: Middle East; Yemen: U.S. Seizes Weapons at Sea

snippet: American Navy ships in the Arabian Sea intercepted and seized an arms shipment from Iran likely bound for Houthi rebels in Yemen, the military said.
